product_name: GIGABYTE GeForce RTX 3070 Gaming OC Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE GeForce RTX 3070 Gaming OC is a powerful gaming graphics card with 8GB of GDDR6 memory and a wide 256-bit memory bus for high bandwidth. It features a core clock of 1500 MHz for exceptional gaming performance and includes 46 ray tracing cores for 48 TFLOPS of ray tracing performance.

product_name: GIGABYTE Radeon RX 6700 XT Gaming OC Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE Radeon RX 6700 XT Gaming OC is a high-performance AMD graphics card. With 12GB of GDDR6 memory and a 192-bit memory bus, it offers excellent gaming performance. Its core clock of 2424 MHz ensures smooth gameplay, although it does not feature ray tracing cores or ray tracing performance.

product_name: GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 Low Profile Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE GeForce GT 710 is a low-profile graphics card suitable for basic computing needs. It comes with 2GB of DDR3 memory and a 64-bit memory bus for everyday tasks. Its core clock of 954 MHz provides decent performance for office and multimedia use, but it does not support ray tracing.
